mapper.select: select gt.id, gt.gname, gt.grprice, od.shoppingnum, gt.grprice * od.shoppingnum smallTotal from orderdetail as od join goodstable as gt on od.goodstable_id = gt.id where od.orderbasetable_id = #{id}

SELECT SUM(gt.grprice * od.shoppingnum) AS value, gy.typename AS name FROM orderbasetable ob JOIN orderdetail od ON ob.id = od.orderbasetable_id JOIN goodstable gt ON od.goodstable_id = gt.id JOIN goodstype gy ON gt.goodstype_id = gy.id WHERE ob.status = 1
GROUP BY gy.typename
